tool_description:
Korean Slang(Profanity) Search API
한국어 욕설(비속어) 검색 API
You can use chatting or a user response platform
name: koreanslangsearch
title: koreanslangsearch

api_list.name: chkKoreanSlang
api_list.description: Please pass "content" parameter in korean slang
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://koreanslangsearch.p.rapidapi.com/chkKoreanSlang"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koreanslangsearch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://koreanslangsearch.p.rapidapi.com/chkKoreanSlang"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "koreanslangsearch.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
